title: Delhi City Tour
description: Explore India's capital city with a mix of heritage, politics, and street life. Visit monuments, taste street food, and experience local culture.
summary: Visit Red Fort and Jama Masjid
Shopping at Chandni Chowk and Connaught Place

title: Mumbai Explorer
description: Discover the city of dreams, known for Bollywood, beaches, and bustling nightlife.
summary: Gateway of India and Marine Drive

title: Bangalore Garden City
description: Experience the green tech hub of India with gardens, palaces, and a vibrant café culture.

title: Hyderabad Heritage Tour
description: Dive into Nizami history, iconic biryani, and IT charm in the City of Pearls.
summary: Golconda Fort and Ramoji Film City
Hussain Sagar Lake and Local Shopping

title: Kolkata Culture Walk
description: Soak in the art, music, literature, and colonial charm of India’s cultural capital.
summary: Tram Ride and Street Food Exploration

title: Chennai Coastal Trail
description: Experience South India's tradition, temples, and Marina Beach vibes.
summary: Kapaleeshwarar Temple and San Thome Church

title: Ahmedabad Heritage Ride
description: Discover the rich history of Gujarat’s capital — full of stepwells, ashrams, and food.
summary: Night Food Market at Manek Chowk

title: Jaipur Pink City Tour
description: Feel royal in the land of forts, palaces, and Rajasthani culture.
summary: Local Bazaar Shopping and Rajasthani Cuisine
